commands.name: help
commands.hint: help : displays information about available commands

commands.name: get_block
commands.hint: get_block <hash> : returns details of block with hash

commands.name: send
commands.hint: send <amount> <address> : sends specified amout to peer with given addresss

commands.name: balance
commands.hint: balance: returns current balance of the current account

commands.name: create
commands.hint: create <dir> <pass> : create a new account in directory [dir] with password [pass]

commands.name: login
commands.hint: login <dir> <pass> : attempts to login to account

commands.name: launch
commands.hint: launch <port> : launches peer to on port <port>

commands.name: peers
commands.hint: peers : lists all currently known peers

commands.name: chain_head
commands.hint: chain_head : displays hash of current block chain head

commands.name: lookup
commands.hint: lookup <hash> : displays information about block with [hash]

commands.name: quit
commands.hint: quit : shutsdown services and closes client
